casebody.data:
Submitted September 30, affirmed November 9, 2011 STATE OF OREGON, Plaintiff-Respondent, v. DAVID ALAN HOUSEHOLDER, Defendant-Appellant.

Multnomah County Circuit Court

090646851; A144856 266 P3d 161 Peter Gartlan, Chief Defender, and David SherboHuggins, Deputy Public Defender, Office of Public Defense Services, filed the brief for appellant. John R. Kroger, Attorney General, Mary H. Williams, Solicitor General, and Joanna L. Jenkins, Assistant Attorney General, filed the brief for respondent. PER CURIAM

Before Schuman, Presiding Judge, and Wollheim, Judge, and Nakamoto, Judge.
